column4: When in "Gnome classic" mode, I thought I used to right click on items in the Applications menu in order to add them to the panel. However, in 11.10 when I right click them, they just launch as if I had left clicked them. Is there a different way to add things to the panel now?
you can't just add stuff to the Gnome 3 fall back mode, it's not Gnome 2
it's similar in some ways, but differnet in others
then how do I add things from the menu to the panel?
